Source file src/github.com/johnstarich/env2config/cmd/env2config/main.go

Documentation: github.com/johnstarich/env2config/cmd/env2config 

     1  package main
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"fmt"
     5  	"os"
     6  	"os/exec"
     7  	"strings"
     8  
     9  	"github.com/johnstarich/env2config"
    10  	"github.com/kelseyhightower/envconfig"
    11  	"github.com/pkg/errors"
    12  
    13  	_ "github.com/johnstarich/env2config/formats"
    14  )
    15  
    16  type App struct {
    17  	Configs []string
    18  }
    19  
    20  func main() {
    21  	err := run(os.Args[1:])
    22  	if err != nil {
    23  		fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, errors.Wrap(err, "e2c"))
    24  		os.Exit(1)
    25  	}
    26  }
    27  
    28  func run(args []string) error {
    29  	var app App
    30  	err := envconfig.Process("E2C", &app)
    31  	if err != nil {
    32  		return err
    33  	}
    34  	var configErrs []string
    35  	for _, configName := range app.Configs {
    36  		err := writeConfig(configName)
    37  		if err != nil {
    38  			configErrs = append(configErrs, err.Error())
    39  		}
    40  	}
    41  	if len(configErrs) > 0 {
    42  		return errors.New("Failed to generate configs:\n\n" + strings.Join(configErrs, "\n\n"))
    43  	}
    44  
    45  	if len(args) == 0 {
    46  		return nil
    47  	}
    48  	cmd := exec.Command(args[0], args[1:]...)
    49  	cmd.Stdin = os.Stdin
    50  	cmd.Stdout = os.Stdout
    51  	cmd.Stderr = os.Stderr
    52  	return cmd.Run()
    53  }
    54  
    55  func writeConfig(name string) error {
    56  	config, err := env2config.New(name)
    57  	if err != nil {
    58  		return err
    59  	}
    60  	err = config.Write()
    61  	return errors.Wrap(err, config.Name)
    62  }
    63  

Build version go1.16.3.
